attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: They are a complete waste of money and the biggest BLOT on our landscape since the coal slag heaps of the 19th century. They kill wildlife and produce greenhouse gasses by Drying out the 'Protectected Land' that most are built upon. We need more Waterpowered generator's which can run 24/7 and produce much cleaner power without spoiling the outlook of our enviroment.
